definitions.definition: A belief in a coming religious millennium , especially ( Christianity ) the belief in a coming thousand-year reign of peace heralded by the Second Coming of Christ; utopianism , belief in a coming era of peace and prosperity.

main_definition: A belief in a coming religious millennium , especially ( Christianity ) the belief in a coming thousand-year reign of peace heralded by the Second Coming of Christ; utopianism , belief in a coming era of peace and prosperity. [from 19th c.]
